entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Add-Migration not recognized after install of Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Tools #37205

Updated

  • PackageInstall.Tests timeout known build error #36192
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • dotnet tool update form private registry fails #37379
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.Sdk project is not running as startup project if it resides inside of a solution folder #37024
  • SDK is incorrectly emitted SupportedOSPlatform("Windows7.0") #37220
  • [Broken Build]: Dotnet Publish is not idempotent and deletes required Content #37222
    Discussion
  • Runtime identifier not validated by dotnet build if --no-self-contained is passed #36746
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • add devcontainer support #37412
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Fix typos of Register-ArgumentCompleter parameters #37411
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37408
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Move `src/Tests` to `test` #37200
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new

Updated

  • init tool list format option #37394
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Trusted roots: 2023-11 CTL #37406
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Trusted roots: 2023-11 CTL #37405
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Trusted roots: 2023-11 CTL #37404
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #37311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Fix stage 2 VMR source-build #37407
    source-build, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
